info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 5 at 8:27AM CDT until May 7 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Lubbock TX
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Lubbock has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Texas...
Double Mountain Fork Brazos at Justiceburg affecting Garza County.
For the Double Mountain Fork Brazos...including Justiceburg, Aspermont 10S, Lubbock 4ESE...elevated river levels are forecast.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 700 AM CDT.
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Double Mountain Fork Brazos at Justiceburg.
* WHEN...From this morning to early Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The pool elevation of Lake Alan Henry will increase significantly.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 6.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING
